description: AWS Datazone Environment Profile is pre-configured set of resources and blueprints that provide reusable templates for creating environments.

EnvironmentParameter.description: The parameter details of an environment profile.

Name.description: The name of an environment profile parameter.
Name.markdownDescription:
The name of an environment profile parameter.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value of an environment profile parameter.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value of an environment profile parameter.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

EnvironmentParameter.markdownDescription:
The parameter details of an environment profile.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

AwsAccountId.description: The AWS account in which the Amazon DataZone environment is created.
AwsAccountId.markdownDescription:
The AWS account in which the Amazon DataZone environment is created.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^\d{12}$  
Update requires: No interruption

AwsAccountRegion.description: The AWS region in which this environment profile is created.
AwsAccountRegion.markdownDescription:
The AWS region in which this environment profile is created.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^[a-z]{2}-[a-z]{4,10}-\d$  
Update requires: No interruption

Description.description: The description of this Amazon DataZone environment profile.
Description.markdownDescription:
The description of this Amazon DataZone environment profile.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Update requires: No interruption

DomainIdentifier.description: The ID of the Amazon DataZone domain in which this environment profile is created.
DomainIdentifier.markdownDescription:
The ID of the Amazon DataZone domain in which this environment profile is created.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^dzd[-_][a-zA-Z0-9_-]{1,36}$  
Update requires: Replacement

EnvironmentBlueprintIdentifier.description: The ID of the blueprint with which this environment profile is created.
EnvironmentBlueprintIdentifier.markdownDescription:
The ID of the blueprint with which this environment profile is created.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9_-]{1,36}$  
Update requires: Replacement

Name.description: The name of this Amazon DataZone environment profile.
Name.markdownDescription:
The name of this Amazon DataZone environment profile.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 64  
Pattern: ^[\w -]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

ProjectIdentifier.description: The identifier of the project in which to create the environment profile.
ProjectIdentifier.markdownDescription:
The identifier of the project in which to create the environment profile.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9_-]{1,36}$  
Update requires: Replacement

The user parameters of this Amazon DataZone environment profile.
